original_text: And when they had carried out all that was written of him, they took him down from the tree and laid him in a tomb.
korean_text: 성경에 그를 가리켜 기록한 말씀을 다 응하게 한 것이라 후에 나무에서 내려다가 무덤에 두었으나

sentences.original_text: And when they had carried out all that was written of him,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그에 관하여 기록된 모든 것을 행하였을 때,

sentences.original_text: they took him down from the tree
and laid him in a tomb.
